description: This file contains utility methods for validation within the notes management backend, specifically for checking combined length constraints on note titles and content.

classes.name: ValidationUtil
classes.description: A utility class providing validation methods related to business rules, such as length constraints on combined title and content.

methods.name: validateCombinedLength
methods.description: Checks that the total length of title and content does not exceed 5200 characters, throwing BusinessException if the constraint is violated.
